source.sqlReaderQuery: select lastmodifieddate from highwatermark where name='Agent'

activities.name: Get Last Modified Date from Database

source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(create_timestamp) as create_timestamp from agent

dependsOn.activity: Get Last Modified Date from Database

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from agent where create_timestamp > '@{activity('Get HW Date for Agent').output.firstRow.lastmodifieddate }' and create_timestamp <='@{activity('Get Last Modified Date from Database').output.firstRow.create_timestamp}'

activities.name: HighWaterMark Update
activities.description: we can also use lookup activity to update hW table with update dml statement

sqlReaderQuery.value: select 'Agent' as name , '@{activity('Get Last Modified Date from Database').output.firstRow.create_timestamp}' as lastmodifieddate

source.sqlReaderQuery: select lastmodifieddate from highwatermark where name='Claim'

activities.name: Get Last Modified Date from Database

source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(LastUpdatedTimestamp) as LastUpdatedTimestamp from Claim

dependsOn.activity: Get Last Modified Date from Database

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from Claim where LastUpdatedTimestamp > '@{activity('Get HW Date for Agent').output.firstRow.lastmodifieddate }' and LastUpdatedTimestamp <='@{activity('Get Last Modified Date from Database').output.firstRow.LastUpdatedTimestamp}'

activities.name: HighWaterMark Update
activities.description: we can also use lookup activity to update hW table with update dml statement

sqlReaderQuery.value: select 'Claim' as name , '@{activity('Get Last Modified Date from Database').output.firstRow.LastUpdatedTimestamp}' as lastmodifieddate

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT TOP (1000) FirstName,middlename,lastname,emailaddress FROM  [SalesLT].[Customer] a inner join [SalesLT].[CustomerAddress] b on a.customerid=b.customerid

activities.name: Copy SQLDB to ADLS Branch Info
activities.description: Copy SQLDB to ADLS Branch Info

source.sqlReaderQuery: select count(*) as count from saleslt.customeraddress

properties.description: Move data from SQL DB to ADLS
